name: A City Run - Join the Fun Run
name_original: A City Run - Join the Fun Run
description:
Join the real running adventure!

Bonus levels, mystical worlds and power-ups would make you play more. Run as fast as you can while jumping, pushing/moving boxes and other platforms to help you dodge the enemies. You can even double jump to prevent fatal incidents.

Collect as many apples as you can to unlock, buy and use power ups. Apples are the currency of this game. The more you collect, the more you'll get.

Power-Ups:

Super Jump - enhances your ability to jump higher and with the double jump, you can reach far more than your enemies.

Basket Magnet - attracts all apples closest to you, like an "apple magnet"

Shield - when activated, helps you destroy all enemies. Shields you from everything, unless if you are falling in holes.

Unlock all worlds and at the end of each, you have a BONUS level to help you through the running adventure. You can unlock the bonus level every time you want to get more apples.

Optimized for all Apple devices!
Play now, it's FREE!

P.S. Become a Fan of A City Run on Facebook:
https://www.facebook.com/A-City-Run-368886976917877/
